name: YourDailyMotivation
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This is a short briefing consisting of daily words and pearls of wisdom spoken by inspirational people from around the world. Whether you're starting your day, in the middle of a situation, or wanting to refuel after you've put in the hours at work, these words will help you get through those moments of suffering and keep you going.

Your Daily Motivation is that kick on your backside that all of us need every now and then, to help accomplish your goals and build a better future for yourself.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
